item.title: About

I’m also a Fishing Engineer based at the end of the world üåé ‚Äî Ushuaia, Tierra del Fuego, Argentina. I’m passionate about Free and Open Source Software ‚ù§Ô∏è, not just as a tool, but as a foundation for technological sovereignty and collaborative knowledge.
